categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic regiments

nodes.text: The 76th Regiment was a mobile armored unit in the Grand Army of the Republic that utilized HAVw A6 Juggernauts, AT-TE walkers, AT-AP walkers, and AT-RT walkers. The regiment was identified by dark gray markings painted on their vehicles.

The 76th Regiment was under the command of Jedi Master Yoda at the time of the invasion of Kashyyyk by the Separatist Army. It remained to hunt for Master Yoda when Emperor Palpatine sent Commander Gree instructions to execute Order 66.
